--- title: "CRGE Historical Database - English" --- # CRGE Historical Database Welcome to the English version of the **CRGE Historical Database**, a comprehensive resource documenting Christian missionary history and religious agency in East Asia.

## About This Database This digital archive contains extensive documentation of Christian missionary activities, religious movements, and cultural interactions across East Asian regions including China, Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Manchuria. The content spans from the late 19th century through the modern era, offering insights into the complex relationships between Christianity and local societies. ## Database Overview - **Total Database Entries:** 768- **Geographic Areas:** 6- **Time Periods:** 14- **Topics Covered:** 2- **Entries with English Content:** 254 ## Geographic Coverage **Korea:** 156 entries across 13 time periods (116 with English content) **Taiwan:** 144 entries across 12 time periods (23 with English content) **China:** 132 entries across 11 time periods (60 with English content) **Hong Kong:** 132 entries across 11 time periods (0 with English content) **Japan:** 132 entries across 11 time periods (0 with English content) **Manchuria:** 72 entries across 6 time periods (55 with English content) ## Browse by Region ### 🇨🇳 China -
